item.description:
This is a meetup mainly to rehearse for the Music Guild open mike on Wed the 19th st 7PM.

The agenda is:

1PM - Meet newcomers, practice individual interests, jam
2PM - Open Mike, performer song rehearsal
3PM - Identify house band interest level(s), organize, choose songs for Wed
3:30 - Rehearse songs.

(Approximate times)

If you want to perform or to be in the house band(s) for the open mike, bring your songlist and for any songs that are not easy, bring about 4 copies of 2 or 3 songs you want to play on 1 sheet per song if possible, so others can play it. I have two amps and a PA, but we can't play too loud.
item.how_to_find_us: call me if you get lost

group.name: The NEW England Singer Songwriter Musician Guild

item.name: Jam & Rehearsal for Open Mike
